fields.description: Urban can mean what you want, either explore the 'grungy' urban scene or celebrate the stunning backdrops it provides for your portrais.
Enjoy a photoshoot with more natural backdrops. This can provide a variety of effects, including some silmple backgrounds to make you the star of the show.

It's important to capture special moments, and your big day is definately a specail moment. Full day sessions include pictures of the bridal and grooms party getting ready as well as guest images at the reception.
Learn how to take breathaking pictures. Full day sessions include editing on Adobe Photoshop.
